text: Unibuke (yewe Muhamadi) ubwo Nyagasani wawe yabwiraga abamalayika ati “Mu by’ukuri, ngiye gushyira umusigire (ikiremwamuntu) ku isi.” Baravuga bati “Ese urayishyiraho uzayikoreraho ubwangizi akanamena amaraso, kandi twe tugusingiza tukanagushimira ndetse tukanagutagatifuza? (Allah) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri, Njye nzi ibyo mutazi.”
